VitePress
  • Images
  • Videos
  • Albums
  • Reels

Supported Media #

Instagram Planner supports all kind of media: images, videos, albums and reels.
Check these examples and add your media in the config/profiles/{id}/media/ folder.

Images #

{
  "dxlliv": {
    "media": [
      // strict image import
      {
        "type": "image",
        "name": "4.jpg"
      },
      
      // short import
      "3.jpg",
      "2.jpg",
      "1.jpg"
    ]
  }
}

Videos #

{
  "dxlliv": {
    "media": [
      // strict video import
      {
        "type": "video",
        "name": "4-video.mp4",
        "cover": 0
      },

      // short import
      "3.jpg",
      "2.jpg",
      "1.jpg"
    ]
  }
}

Albums #

{
  "dxlliv": {
    "media": [
      // import images as an album
      {
        "type": "album",
        "list": [
          "3.jpg",
          "2.jpg",
          "1.jpg"
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}

Reels #

{
  "dxlliv": {
    "media": [
      // reel import
      {
        "type": "reel",
        "name": "3-reel.mp4",
        "cover": 0
      },

      // short import
      "3.jpg",
      "2.jpg",
      "1.jpg"
    ]
  }
}
